exam.question: All the guests were invited to attend the wedding ______ and had a very good time.

answer.explain: 句意： 所有客人都应邀参加了婚宴， 而且玩得很愉快。congratulation： 祝贺； festival： 节日； recreation： 消遣， 娱乐。

sentences.sContent: They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.sCn: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

phrases.pCn: 尽情欣赏；尽情享受；大吃大喝
n. 节日；斋日；宗教节日

remMethod.val: f(看作fly， 飞) ＋ east(东方) → 东方腾飞的那一天 → 盛宴， 筵席； 节日

trans.tranCn: 尽情地吃， 宴饮； 参加宴会
trans.tranOther: If you feast on a particular food, you eat a large amount of it with great enjoyment
a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion
